resources.string: peach
Escrow funded
The escrow has been funded and your offer is published.
Different amount funded
The escrow has been funded with a different amount. Continue with your offer or get refunded!
Escrow not funded
The amount you sent to the escrow is outside the trading limits. You\'ll be refunded, please re-create your offer.
Offer canceled
You haven\'t funded your escrow in %2$s days 😞 We are deleting this offer.
No match
Your sell offer has been closed after not receiving a match for %2$s days.
Offer hasn\'t received a match for 23 days.
Your buy offer %1$s still hasn\'t received a match - it will be removed in a week.
Offer hasn\'t received a match for %2$s days.
Your buy offer %1$s hasn\'t received a match after %2$s days and has been removed.
Matches are waiting for you.
You\'ve got new matches, don\'t leave them hanging!
Matches are waiting for you!
You\'ve got new matches, don\'t leave them hanging!
Your match got accepted:
You need to make the payment within twelve hours. The faster you are, the better your Peach score will be.
You only have six hours left to confirm that you made the payment!
You only have one hour left to confirm that you made the payment! If you don\'t do this in time, the seller can cancel the trade.
You didn\'t indicate you made the payment, and the timer ran out! The seller now needs to decide how to proceed - please chat with them to resolve the issue.
You didn\'t make the payment on time, and the seller decided to cancel the trade. Your reputation has been negatively affected.
You didn\'t make the payment on time, but the seller has decided to give you 12 more hours to make the payment.
The payment for trade %1$s wasn\'t made on time. Please open the app to give the buyer more time or cancel the trade.
The buyer for trade %1$s made the payment. Please check if you received it and mark the payment as received as soon as possible.
Trade completed!
The sats for trade %1$s are in your wallet 🎉
Chat
You got a chat message
The seller has started a dispute for trade %1$s for %2$s sats.
The buyer has started a dispute for trade %1$s for %2$s sats.
Dispute
The dispute for trade %1$s has been resolved. Please check the message from your mediator in the trade chat to see what\'s next.
We\'ve ruled your in favor in the dispute for trade %1$s. Please check the message from your mediator in the trade chat to see what\'s next.
We\'ve ruled in favor of the seller in the dispute for trade %1$s. Please check the message from your mediator in the trade chat to see what\'s next.
We\'ve ruled your in favor in the dispute for trade %1$s. Please check the message from your mediator in the trade chat to see what\'s next.
We\'ve ruled in favor of the buyer in the dispute for trade %1$s. Please check the message from your mediator in the trade chat to see what\'s next.
Trade cancelation
The buyer for trade %1$s has canceled. You can choose to keep your offer open to look for a new match, or you can be refunded.
Trade cancelation
The buyer for trade %1$s has canceled. Please open the app to arrange your refund.
The seller for trade %1$s wants to cancel.
Please open the app to accept or reject the cancelation.
Trade canceled
The buyer for trade %1$s has agreed to cancel. You can choose to keep your offer open to look for a new match, or you can be refunded.
Trade not canceled
The buyer for trade %1$s has not agreed to cancel. The trade will continue as normal.
